mapper.select: SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, ANSWER, IF(ANSWER IS NULL,'X','O') ANSWER_YN, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM FROM COUNSEL A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ', (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY SEQ ) DATA ORDER BY SEQ DESC

SELECT PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, ANSWER, IF(LENGTH(IFNULL(ANSWER,''))=0,'N','Y') ANSWER_YN, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID) USER_NAME, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM FROM COUNSEL A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ', (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%') ORDER BY SEQ ) DATA ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) PAGE LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COUNSEL WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%')

SELECT SEQ, A.CATEGORY, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, ANSWER, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM COUNSEL A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT SEQ, B.DD_VALUE CATEGORY_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, ANSWER, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM COUNSEL A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE B ON A.CATEGORY = B.DD_KEY AND B.DD_MAIN = 'FAQ' WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE COUNSEL SET CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE COUNSEL SET ANSWER = #{answer}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
